alert.note: Alert for Northern Clearwater Mountains; Southern Clearwater Mountains (Idaho) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Missoula (Western Montana and Central Idaho)
info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued January 08 at 10:59AM MST until January 10 at 11:00AM MST by NWS Missoula
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 4 PM THIS AFTERNOON TO 10 AM PST WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...Heavy snow expected. Total snow accumulations 6 to 12 inches and 12 to 18 inches for Lolo Pass. Up to 2 feet in the higher terrain. Winds gusting as high as 40 mph on Tuesday. * WHERE...Dixie, Pierce, Elk City, Highway 12 Lowell to Lolo Pass, Elk River, and Highway 11 Pierce to Headquarters. * WHEN...From 4 PM this afternoon to 10 AM PST Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult to impossible. Widespread blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. Gusty winds could bring down tree branches.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Northern Clearwater Mountains; Southern Clearwater Mountains
